title: 2015 (S.I. No. 58 of 2015) are amended by substituting for Regulation 22(1) (as
heading: 2. (1) The Animal Health and Welfare (Bovine Tuberculosis) Regulations
text_raw:
2. (1) The Animal Health and Welfare (Bovine Tuberculosis) Regulations 
2015 (S.I. No. 58 of 2015) are amended by substituting for Regulation 22(1) (as 
inserted by the Animal Health and Welfare (Bovine Tuberculosis) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 309 of 2016)) the following– 

“22. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the Minister may pay, following a direction 
under section 30 of the Act for the purposes of bovine tuberculosis, an amount 
not exceeding— 

(a) 

€3,000 in respect of a bovine other than a bovine mentioned in 
subparagraph (b), or 

(b) 

 €5,000 in respect of– 

(i) 

a pedigree cow or pedigree in calf heifer, or 

(ii) 

a pedigree stock bull up to a maximum of 3 such bulls in a 
single breakdown period 

on foot of a declaration made under Regulation 13(1)(a) or (2)(a).”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 December, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025.
